meanings.definition: A drug used to treat type 2 diabetes by slowing down the digestion of carbohydrates in the body.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed acarbose to help manage my diabetes.
meanings.sent2: She takes acarbose with her meals to control her blood sugar levels.
meanings.sent3: After taking acarbose, I felt like my stomach was on a slow-motion ride!
meanings.sent4: Acarbose is like a traffic cop for carbs, making sure they don't rush through your system.
meanings.sent5: The effect of acarbose is like putting a speed bump in the path of sugar.
